text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states the relevant rule regarding GILTI FTCs: \"excess foreign tax credits in the GILTI basket that cannot be used \u2014 because, for example, the aggregate foreign tax rate exceeds the effective U.S. rate on GILTI \u2014 those excess credits are neither refundable nor carryable to other years under current law (Section 904(c) does not permit carryforward or carryback of GILTI basket credits, a point that is sometimes overlooked).\" This directly addresses the criterion that GILTI FTCs have no carryforwards.", "criterion_id": "fe820b5e-6973-4f26-b09f-c40991ea99b5"}
